channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Double Yellow Lines virtually non existant, 15th July
item.description:
The length of Fairmount Road The double yellow lines the whole length of the street have worn away almost completely
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairmount Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water running down Langley Lane, 15th July
item.description:
100m from Lower Langley Farm going towards Winchcombe water is constantly running onto road. Water is from spring. Severn Trent have tested water and itâ€™s not a mains leak. Very treacherous in the winter months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Trees on Telstar Way, 15th July
item.description:
Some of the trees on the verge between Telstar Way and the rear of houses on Gemini Close are touching 2 Gemini Close and have potential to cause damage. These have been previously cut back successfully on two occasions.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Gemini Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
